metadata.name: master
metadata.description: Main task list for Room Detection AI project

tasks.title: Set up AWS Infrastructure
tasks.description: Set up AWS account and configure services. Create S3 bucket for blueprint storage, configure API Gateway, set up Lambda function skeleton, configure CloudWatch logging.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- aws/infrastructure/cloudformation.yaml (or terraform/main.tf)
- aws/config/s3-config.json
- aws/config/lambda-config.json
- README.md (AWS setup section)

**Files to Modify:**
- .gitignore (add AWS credentials patterns)

**Key Requirements:**
- S3 bucket for blueprint storage
- API Gateway REST API setup
- Lambda function skeleton
- CloudWatch logging configuration
tasks.testStrategy: Verify AWS resources are created and accessible via AWS CLI or console

tasks.title: Convert COCO Annotations to YOLO Format
tasks.description: Convert COCO format annotations to YOLO format for training. Use existing coco_to_yolo.py script to convert train_coco_pt.json, val_coco_pt.json, and test_coco_pt.json. Generate YOLO label files and verify image paths match COCO annotation file paths.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- scripts/convert_all_coco_to_yolo.sh
- data/yolo_labels/train/ (directory with .txt files)
- data/yolo_labels/val/ (directory with .txt files)
- data/yolo_labels/test/ (directory with .txt files)
- data/image_paths_mapping.json

**Files to Modify:**
- coco_to_yolo.py (if needed for batch processing)

**Key Requirements:**
- Convert all three COCO JSON files (train, val, test)
- Generate YOLO format label files (.txt)
- Verify image path mappings
- Ensure coordinate transformations are correct
tasks.testStrategy: Validate sample YOLO label files match COCO annotations, verify file counts match image counts

tasks.title: Validate Annotation Quality
tasks.description: Validate annotation quality by visual spot-checking sample images. Create visualization script to verify bounding boxes are accurate.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- scripts/validate_annotations.py
- data/validation_samples/ (directory with sample visualizations)

**Files to Modify:**
- visualize_coco_samples.py (if needed)

**Key Requirements:**
- Visual inspection of random samples
- Verify bounding box accuracy
- Document any issues found
tasks.testStrategy: Review visualizations and confirm bounding boxes align with room boundaries

tasks.title: Set up SageMaker Environment
tasks.description: Set up SageMaker environment and create custom container for YOLOv8. Configure SageMaker training job, upload training data to S3.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- sagemaker/Dockerfile
- sagemaker/train.py
- sagemaker/requirements.txt
- sagemaker/config/training-config.yaml
- scripts/upload_training_data_to_s3.sh

**Files to Modify:**
- .gitignore (add SageMaker outputs)

**Key Requirements:**
- Custom Docker container with YOLOv8
- Training configuration
- S3 upload script for training data
tasks.testStrategy: Verify container builds successfully and training data uploads to S3

tasks.title: Train YOLOv8 Model
tasks.description: Train YOLOv8 model on blueprint dataset using SageMaker. Configure hyperparameters, run training job, evaluate model performance on validation set.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- sagemaker/notebooks/training.ipynb (or sagemaker/scripts/run_training.sh)
- sagemaker/outputs/training_metrics.json
- sagemaker/outputs/model_artifacts/ (directory)

**Files to Modify:**
- sagemaker/train.py (hyperparameter tuning)

**Key Requirements:**
- Train on 4,200 training images
- Validate on validation set
- Track training metrics
- Save model artifacts
tasks.testStrategy: Verify model training completes, check validation metrics (mAP, precision, recall)

tasks.title: Deploy Model to SageMaker Serverless Inference
tasks.description: Deploy trained YOLOv8 model to SageMaker Serverless Inference endpoint. Configure endpoint settings, test inference.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- sagemaker/deploy.py (or sagemaker/scripts/deploy_model.sh)
- sagemaker/config/endpoint-config.yaml
- sagemaker/tests/test_inference.py

**Files to Modify:**
- sagemaker/config/training-config.yaml (if needed)

**Key Requirements:**
- Deploy to Serverless Inference endpoint
- Test inference with sample images
- Verify response format matches API spec
tasks.testStrategy: Test inference endpoint with sample blueprint, verify response format and processing time <30 seconds

tasks.title: Implement Lambda Function for Image Processing
tasks.description: Implement Lambda function for image preprocessing and SageMaker endpoint invocation. Handle image resizing, normalization, coordinate transformation from pixel space to normalized 0-1000 range.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- lambda/handler.py
- lambda/utils/image_processor.py
- lambda/utils/coordinate_transformer.py
- lambda/requirements.txt
- lambda/tests/test_handler.py

**Files to Modify:**
- aws/config/lambda-config.json

**Key Requirements:**
- Image preprocessing (resize to 640x640, normalize)
- Invoke SageMaker endpoint
- Transform coordinates from pixels to 0-1000 range
- Error handling
tasks.testStrategy: Test Lambda with sample images, verify coordinate transformations are correct

tasks.title: Set up API Gateway Integration
tasks.description: Set up API Gateway REST API with async processing support. Implement upload endpoint, status polling endpoint, error handling.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- api/openapi.yaml (or api/swagger.yaml)
- api/handlers/upload_handler.py
- api/handlers/status_handler.py
- api/middleware/error_handler.py
- api/tests/test_api.py

**Files to Modify:**
- aws/infrastructure/cloudformation.yaml (API Gateway resources)

**Key Requirements:**
- POST /api/v1/blueprints/upload endpoint
- GET /api/v1/blueprints/{id}/status endpoint
- Async processing support
- Error responses
tasks.testStrategy: Test API endpoints with curl/Postman, verify async processing workflow

tasks.title: Implement Async Processing & Status Tracking
tasks.description: Implement async processing workflow with status tracking. Set up DynamoDB or in-memory storage for status, implement polling logic.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- lambda/utils/status_manager.py
- lambda/utils/async_processor.py
- api/handlers/polling_handler.py

**Files to Modify:**
- lambda/handler.py (add status tracking)
- api/openapi.yaml (add status endpoints)

**Key Requirements:**
- Status storage (DynamoDB or in-memory)
- Status updates (processing → completed/failed)
- Polling endpoint implementation
tasks.testStrategy: Test status tracking through full workflow, verify polling returns correct status

tasks.title: Set up React Frontend Project
tasks.description: Initialize React project with TypeScript, set up build configuration, install dependencies. Configure routing (single page), set up state management.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- frontend/package.json
- frontend/tsconfig.json
- frontend/vite.config.ts (or frontend/webpack.config.js)
- frontend/src/index.tsx
- frontend/src/App.tsx
- frontend/.gitignore

**Files to Modify:**
- .gitignore (add frontend build outputs)

**Key Requirements:**
- React with TypeScript
- Build tool (Vite recommended)
- Single-page application structure
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project builds and runs locally

tasks.title: Implement File Upload Component
tasks.description: Implement drag & drop file upload component with file validation (PNG/JPG, max 50MB). Add file preview, process button, error handling.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx
- frontend/src/components/FileUpload.module.css (or FileUpload.css)
- frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts
- frontend/src/types/file.ts

**Files to Modify:**
- frontend/src/App.tsx (integrate upload component)

**Key Requirements:**
- Drag & drop support
- File browser alternative
- PNG/JPG validation
- 50MB size limit
- File preview display
tasks.testStrategy: Test file upload with valid/invalid files, verify validation works

tasks.title: Implement Blueprint Display Component
tasks.description: Implement blueprint image display with HTML5 Canvas overlay for bounding boxes. Handle image loading, canvas rendering, coordinate transformation from API (0-1000 range to pixels).
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- frontend/src/components/BlueprintDisplay.tsx
- frontend/src/components/BlueprintDisplay.module.css
- frontend/src/utils/canvasRenderer.ts
- frontend/src/utils/coordinateTransformer.ts
- frontend/src/types/blueprint.ts

**Files to Modify:**
- frontend/src/App.tsx (integrate display component)

**Key Requirements:**
- Image display with aspect ratio preservation
- Canvas overlay synchronized with image
- Bounding box rendering with distinct colors
- Coordinate transformation (0-1000 → pixels)
- React front-end renders automatically-created room boundaries
tasks.testStrategy: Test with sample API response, verify bounding boxes render correctly on image

tasks.title: Implement Status & Loading Components
tasks.description: Implement loading indicators and status messages during processing. Add polling logic for async status updates, error state handling.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- frontend/src/components/LoadingIndicator.tsx
- frontend/src/components/StatusMessage.tsx
- frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts
- frontend/src/services/apiClient.ts
- frontend/src/types/api.ts

**Files to Modify:**
- frontend/src/App.tsx (add status management)

**Key Requirements:**
- Loading spinner/indicator
- Status messages (uploading, processing, complete)
- Polling hook (every 2-3 seconds)
- Error state handling
- API client for HTTP requests
tasks.testStrategy: Test polling logic, verify status updates display correctly

tasks.title: Implement Export Functionality
tasks.description: Implement export buttons for annotated image (PNG with bounding boxes) and JSON coordinates. Create canvas export logic, file download functionality.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- frontend/src/components/ExportButtons.tsx
- frontend/src/utils/imageExporter.ts
- frontend/src/utils/jsonExporter.ts
- frontend/src/utils/canvasCompositor.ts

**Files to Modify:**
- frontend/src/components/BlueprintDisplay.tsx (add export handlers)

**Key Requirements:**
- Export annotated image (PNG with bounding boxes)
- Export JSON coordinates
- File download functionality
- Proper file naming (timestamp-based)
tasks.testStrategy: Test export buttons, verify downloaded files are correct format and contain expected data

tasks.title: Error Handling & UI Polish
tasks.description: Implement error display component, add error recovery, polish UI styling and responsiveness. Add accessibility features (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation).
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- frontend/src/components/ErrorDisplay.tsx
- frontend/src/styles/global.css
- frontend/src/styles/variables.css (color palette, typography)
- frontend/src/utils/accessibility.ts

**Files to Modify:**
- All frontend components (add error handling, styling, accessibility)

**Key Requirements:**
- Error display component
- Error recovery (retry functionality)
- UI styling (color palette, typography, spacing)
- Responsive design
- Accessibility (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)
tasks.testStrategy: Test error scenarios, verify accessibility with screen reader, test responsive layout

tasks.title: End-to-End Testing
tasks.description: Test complete workflow with multiple blueprint samples. Verify processing time <30 seconds, validate bounding box accuracy, test export functionality.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- tests/e2e/test_workflow.py (or tests/e2e/test_workflow.spec.ts)
- tests/fixtures/sample_blueprints/ (test images)
- tests/reports/test_results.json

**Files to Modify:**
- README.md (add testing instructions)

**Key Requirements:**
- Test full workflow (upload → process → view → export)
- Verify processing time <30 seconds
- Validate bounding box accuracy
- Test with multiple blueprint samples
tasks.testStrategy: Run end-to-end tests, verify all functionality works together, check performance metrics

tasks.title: Documentation & Demo Preparation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation, prepare demo materials. Write API documentation, setup guide, architecture diagram.
tasks.details:
**Files to Create:**
- docs/API.md
- docs/SETUP.md
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md
- docs/TRAINING.md
- demo/demo_script.md
- demo/sample_blueprints/ (demo images)

**Files to Modify:**
- README.md (comprehensive project overview)

**Key Requirements:**
- API documentation
- Setup and deployment guide
- Architecture diagram
- Model training documentation
- Demo script and materials
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for completeness and accuracy
